short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Schoology media albums with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a button to Schoology media album pages and allows the user to download all the photos zipped in an archive with a single click.

Privacy Policy
All data is stored locally on the user's computer. No data is collected or sent anywhere.
